returns._0: A string describing whether the input is positive, negative, or zero
A string describing the boolean value

checkRange(int256).details: Checks the range of a number

A string describing whether the input is positive, negative, or zero

isInRange(int256,int256,int256).details: Checks if a number is within a specific range

params.lower: The lower bound of the range
params.upper: The upper bound of the range

returns._0: true if the number is within the range (inclusive), false otherwise
